name: The Finnish Family Firms Association
goal: The association for Finnish Family Businesses.   Our strategic priorities and objects are Networking, Learning and Influencing. We are the most interesting meeting place for family business owners.We are the most interesting meeting place for family business owners.We are our members’ main partner in developing ownership competence.The economic and societal significance of family firms and their owners is recognised.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation
